title: Android - Image Recognition
snippet:
Requirements:
 - experienced Android app developer.
 - ability to produce high quality, maintainable, modularized, tested code.
 - experience writing automated unit tests (JUnit etc.).
 - experience with integrating image recognition software/libraries such as Google OCR.

Will be part of a 2 person team. 
Second person will have responsibility for the back-end API.

The app must be capable of capturing images through the app, analysing those images, and performing actions on the image + metadata. For example an image that includes text like: "Next event will take place on Thursday 14th August 2016", needs to be capable of extracting the date, adding it the the calendar app, and transferring the metadata + original image to the back-end API.


Further specific details in the attached document.
